focuses.desc: Start implementing Decreto 70/2023, massive deregulation and institutional reforms.
Introduce Mass Deregulation: privatizations, open market policies.
Align with IMF to secure funding, under stricter conditions.
Attempt partial dollarization of the economy.
Apply Fiscal Chainsaw: cut subsidies, reduce state size.
Balance the books and eliminate deficit, gain market confidence.
Social backlash rises: protests, strikes, unrest.
Political battle with Congress: choose confrontation or negotiation.
Govern by decree: faster reforms but higher instability.
Form alliance with opposition factions: slower reforms, more stability.
Fight with governors: assert federal control.
Co-opt key provinces selectively to maintain stability.
Total war with provinces: high risk of paralysis or rebellion.
Judicial overhaul: attempt to reshape Supreme Court.
Judicial resistance occurs: institutional crisis.
New balance of power achieved: stronger presidential control.
Security & protest management: policies for public order.
Control the streets: stability but human rights criticisms.
Escalation of violence: repression and radicalization.
Long-term outcome: economic miracle, growth and popularity rise.
Authoritarian drift: political control increases, risk of unrest.
Early collapse: economic and political failure.
Hybrid survival: partial reforms succeed, muddled stability.
